package.name: Virtina_Productslider
package.summary: PRODUCT SLIDER extension is used to display all types of products in a particular category in a slider.
package.description: Virtina creates extension for Magento to display PRODUCT SLIDERS for all types of products in the required categories of Magento website. It is device and browser compatible, can add multiple sliders on one page. Products Slider appearance can be easily managed by admin from backend settings. Options provided in the backend enables the admin to choose appearance and behaviour of slider such as number of products to display (Website, tablet, mobile), product types, max items quantity, slider title, option to hide product title, product image, product price, Add to cart button, Product review, control slider speed, loop, autoplay, show control/navigation and many more. There is a settings section in the admin side to configure the extension.
